subject: Re: [junit] Parameterized test case pattern
msgSnippet: ... I mostly run this in Eclipse, but I ve tried outside it too; and many different variants including running it using the Eclispe test runner instead of the
messageBody:
>
> Hi Elliotte,
>
> The exception is thrown from line 25, which seems to be the line:
>> TestRunner.run(suite());
>
> Am I correct? So the failure does not come from your assertTrue statement,
> but it comes when the suite is constructed. Also, is your environment
> filtering the stack trace given? Without filtering there might be more
> specific information about the failure.


I mostly run this in Eclipse, but I've tried outside it too; and many
different variants including running it using the Eclispe test runner
instead of the main method. I've tried putting the suite method in a
different class and running that. I suspect there's some very basic thing
I'm missing.

If someone had an example of this I could start from that actually does
work, that would be very helpful.
